segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even notice; she's just polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle already, and it could get so slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can imagine her slipping and falling hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back, and he's stretched way up for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll crash down with those cookies scattering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is right there too, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not helping with the stool, but she's part of this risky game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked from the water running down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene screams danger, and no one's paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to those kids or the mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
